title: Version Vulnerable
description:
An nmap version scan (-sV) reveals this service:

21/tcp open ftp vsftpd 2.3.4

This specific version of vsftpd contains a famous backdoor that was inserted by an attacker into the source code. When a username ending in ':)' (smiley face) is sent, it opens a shell on port 6200.

What is the CVE identifier for this backdoor?

Submit as: flag{CVE-YYYY-NNNN}
hints: Search 'vsftpd 2.3.4 backdoor' to find the CVE
This vulnerability was discovered in July 2011
It's one of the most famous supply chain attacks in open source history
